Name: PunchingKinoko
Notes: A bubbly plant that the player can fling around to damage other objects and enemies. However, if it hits the player, they will loose a lot of Star Bits. If placed inside a ClipDrawArea in SMG2, it will be shrunken down and unusable. When Bulb Yoshi's light surrounds the plant, it will grow back to its usable size.

Obj_arg7.Name: Camera Register Index
Obj_arg7.Description: Specifies the starting index of the vector register camera.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted and flinged by player 2.
